General.Name: Suzhou Sonavox Electronics Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Suzhou SONAVOX Electronics Co.,Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of audio products and systems for the automotive industry. The company offers loudspeakers, including woofer, tweeter, midrange, and subwoofer loudspeakers. It also provides amplifiers, acoustic vehicle alerting systems, and sound systems for automobiles. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
